title: Show agent activity badge on tick cards
description:
Display visual indicator on tick cards when Claude agent is working on them.

Requirements:
- Show badge/overlay when tick has active task (in_progress)
- Display activeForm text as spinner/status (e.g. 'Adding email validation...')
- Show different states: queued (pending), working (in_progress), done (completed)
- Badge should be subtle but noticeable

Design:
- Small robot icon or spinner in corner of tick card
- Tooltip or small text showing activeForm
- Green checkmark when task completed (until tick synced)

Files:
- internal/tickboard/ui/src/components/tick-card.ts - Add task overlay
- internal/tickboard/ui/src/styles/ - Add badge styles

Test:
- Visually verify badge appears when task active
- Verify spinner animation for in_progress state
acceptance_criteria: Tick cards show agent activity badge with status and activeForm text
